Description: Put the mug under the coffeemachine and turn it on
Turn on the facuest and wash the plate and bowl.
Slice the apple with a knife
Find a butter knife to cut the bread, and take a slice to the toaster for toasting
Crack the egg and cook it on pan
add water into pot over the faucet and the put tomato into it.
Slice the lettuce , and add water into the pot, and put the tomato in and boil it
on the stove, place the pot with water on it and boil
Throw the cracked egg into the bin
Clear out all the food from the fridge

remove potato from the cabinet and put it on the countertop. Take a knife from the drawer and slice it. Put the slices on a plate and put the plate in the microwave. Set the microwave for the appropriate time and start it.
Find the bottle of wine, and a cup from the cabinet. Open the bottle and pour wine into the cup.
Place the food items on the counter. Open the fridge and put the items into the fridge one by one.
Take a cup from the cabinet and put it under the faucet. Turn the faucet on and fill the cup.

Take a potato and a pot from the cabinet. Put the pot under the faucet and fill it with water. Put the pot and water on the stove and use the knob to turn it on. When the water is boiling add the potato.
Find the unused apple slices and put them in the bin.
Find the butter knife, fork, knife,spatula and spoon. Open the drawer and put them all in the drawer.

Task: Pour away coffee in a cup_20_10
Description: Pick up the coffee cup and take it to the sink. Pour the coffee into the sink. Put the empty cup into the sink.
Pick up the pot and take it to the sink. Pour the water into the sink. Put the empty pot in the sink.
Find the light switch. Turn it to the off position.
Sit down on chair, open laptop and type
Sit down on sofa, pick up remote, turn on television

Task: Check the timing on the watch_201_10
Description: Find the watch in the room, and look at the timing.
Fetch the credit card,key chain,remote and newspaper and put them inside the box.
Collect the used tissue papers from floor and throw them in the bin.

Task: Turn off the table lamp or desk lamp_218_10
Description: Turn off the table lamp and desk lamp.
Drop the phone from a height until it cracks
Find the phone and turn it on
Check if anything on the sofa, if yess remove them.
Find the book in the room, open it to read.
